sentences.en: Article 40 Water rights extinguish upon the expiration of the approved duration.
sentences.cn: 第40条(水权之消灭与展限登记)水权于核准年限届满时消灭.

sentences.en: Can I have your credit card number followed by the expiration date?
sentences.cn: 能告诉我你的信用卡号码和它的到期日 吗 ?

sentences.en: Check the expiration date on your passport.
sentences.cn: 检查一下你护照上的截止日期。

sentences.en: Does the East West Bank Prepaid Gift Card have an expiration date?
sentences.cn: 华美银行预付礼金卡有使用期限 吗 ?

sentences.en: It's a coupIe weeks past its expiration date, so it's got a bit of a kick.
sentences.cn: 过期两个礼拜了, 还有一点后劲儿.

sentences.en: Listen to entire inspiration and expiration at each stethoscope position.
sentences.cn: 每一听诊部位听诊均应呼、吸完整.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To study the stability and expiration of tetracaine hydrochloride injection.
sentences.cn: 目的研究盐酸丁卡因注射液的稳定性及贮存期.

sentences.en: Option exercise: six months prior to lease expiration, July 31, 2010.
sentences.cn: 行使选择权: 在2010年7月31日租赁到期日6个月之前.

sentences.en: Period may be extended upon expiration ( through agreement ).
sentences.cn: 通过协议可以延长期限.

sentences.en: The expiration date not valid. Enter a date between tomorrow and | 0.
sentences.cn: 到期日期无效.请输入在明天和|0之间的日期.

sentences.en: The following are possible outcomes of this strategy at expiration.
sentences.cn: 以下说明一下到期时本项策略可能的收益.

sentences.en: The only products an expiration date are those containing SPF.
sentences.cn: 只有含有SPF防 晒值的产品才会标过期日期.

sentences.en: The process of respiration involves two major processes: inspiration and expiration.
sentences.cn: 呼吸的过程包含了两个主要的阶段: 吸气和吐气.

sentences.en: Yes, it will be refunded to you at the expiration of the lease.
sentences.cn: 是的, 租约期满时,押金退回.

sentences.en: Your girlfriend's past her expiration date, and we're crazy?
sentences.cn: 你的女朋友是个死人说我们疯了?

trans.tran_en: the ending of a fixed period of time
